sentences.en: But voice may turn out to be an interim technology.
sentences.cn: 然而语音识别可能只是个过渡技术.

sentences.en: But, in the interim, we obviously have a duty to maintain law and order.
sentences.cn: 但是，在过渡期间，我们显然有责任维护治安。

sentences.en: He received an interim payment of £10,000.
sentences.cn: 他收到暂时支付的一万英镑。

sentences.en: He was to remain in jail in the interim.
sentences.cn: 他在此期间将会继续被关押。

sentences.en: It is indicative only of the interim state of our knowledge.
sentences.cn: 它只表明我们的知识处于过渡性的状态.

sentences.en: It is possible that the present Governor General will be made interim President, if the proposals go through.
sentences.cn: 如果提案获得通过，现任总督可能被任命为临时总统。

sentences.en: It may turn out to be an interim technology.
sentences.cn: 这可能只是个过渡技术。

sentences.en: Little seems to have happened in the interim.
sentences.cn: 在这期间似乎没发生什么事情.

sentences.en: On a calculator, the display or printing of an interim result of a calculation.
sentences.cn: 在计算器上, 显示或打印运算的中间结果.

sentences.en: Some of Australia's largest listed companies are expected to announce huge interim earnings this week.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚最大的一些上市公司预计将在本周宣布巨额中期盈利。

sentences.en: Such interim storage requires an NRC permit.
sentences.cn: 这种临时储存必须经核监视委员会批准.

sentences.en: The chairman may convene interim board meetings on motion of one - third or more of the directors.
sentences.cn: 经 三分之一 以上董事提议,可由董事长召开董事会临时会议.
他们递交了一份临时报告.

sentences.en: This empirical single - parameter model was selected for interim use because it is simple and unambiguous.
sentences.cn: 这一单一参数经验模型,由于其简单明了而选作临时应用.

sentences.en: This is the half-yearly meeting of the interim committee.
sentences.cn: 这是临时委员会召开的年中例会。

sentences.en: This is why he cooled on the idea of an interim settlement at that point.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么那时他对临时解决办法很冷淡.

words.tran_cn: 临时的，暂时的；中间的；间歇的
过渡时期，中间时期；暂定

phrases.tran_cn: 临时贮藏，暂时贮藏；临时存储器

trans.tran_en: intended to be used or accepted for a short time only, until something or someone final can be made or found

trans.tran_cn: 过渡时期，中间时期；暂定
trans.tran_en: in the period of time between two events
